title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.93 - Equipment construction; cleanability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.93 - Equipment construction; cleanability

State Regulations

Equipment is to be constructed to be cleanable: (a) without being disassembled; (b) by disassembling without the use of tools; or
(c) by easy disassembling with the use of only simple tools, such as a mallet, a screwdriver or an open-end wrench kept available near the equipment, unless designed for in-place cleaning. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.93

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
